name: Holiday Inn Express Leeds City Centre-Armouries

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Decent Hotel - very clean, staff welcoming and friendly. Location ideal for Armouries visit (Free) and just a short walk into the City. Rooms only have showers not baths, but we had a great 2 nights for 1 deal, so mustn't grumble! Only negative was that the Sunday breakfast was very hectic and disorganised, but the Hotel was quite full that night. All in all a good value break. Parked at the Multi storey next door - Hotel gave a discount voucher, was £8 daily.
reviews.title: Good Weekend

reviews.text: hi express which does what it says - rooms well maintained - handy location for lots of restaurants inc mumtaz and the kitchen by james martin.
reviews.title: all about location

reviews.text: Stayed at the hotel on a wet night in January, I was very pleasantly surprised with the hotel. It is conveniently located near the Royal Armory. Check in was handled very efficiently, the room was very comfortable set a nice temperature (I find rooms are either too hot or cold, rarely right). Breakfast was the usual Holiday Inn express fare and suits me. The only down side was the £8 (hotel discounted) a night parking fee (glad I wasn't staying several nights) Found a good price on laterooms.com
reviews.title: Good hotel, well situated, nice comfortable rooms

reviews.text: Checked in late in the evening around 28th Dec 2010, the reception staff were pleasant and were quick in providing the room key.
reviews.title: Clean and comfortable

reviews.text: Clean room, comfortable bed.
reviews.title: Nice location. Pleasant stay.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Clean modern and well maintained hotel
reviews.title: Modern hotel

reviews.text: Bedroom had sofa , tea &coffee making. Bathroom very nice . Sheets & towels crisp and fresh.
reviews.title: Excellent value in a lovely location

reviews.text: Bar nice - prices as you would expect for city hotel. Staff very helpful
reviews.title: nicely surprised

reviews.text: Free wifi only in bar not bedrooms
reviews.title: Awful Hotel

reviews.text: Parking £8( with hotel discount) per day NCP next door
reviews.title: Good hotel, slightly out of city centre, reasonable rates......

reviews.text: Firstly, I booked a room for £65.00 and reserved it on my debit card, (Note the word reserved) the hotel the took it uopn themselves to debit £190.00 from my account without my permission! then took over 7 days to pay the money back to me.
reviews.title: For Gods sake do not stay here

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Secondly, my room was filthy, the towels were dirty and the carpet was well disgusting, when I complained I was in no uncertain terms told to go away we are very busy.
reviews.title: Comfortable and clean

reviews.text: Thirdly, I ordered some food at 7.30pm it was only a dish of Paella and I was made to wait until 9.30 for it, there were around 10 people in the dining room an i was made to wait two and a half hours for paella! And it was cold, I mean stone cold!!!!
reviews.title: Just what it says on the tin

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Forthly, The staff are hapless they just do not have a clue, the manager cannot speak english at all well, nor can most of the staff, the customer relations eamil doesn't work and the help line just rings out, so there is no avenue to complain.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

reviews.text: And Number 5. Do not stay here!!!!!!!!!! Give this horrible hotel a wide birth stay a Bewleys it the same price and is excellent.
reviews.title: A great short stay

reviews.text: Our one night stay was fine and the rate of £39.00 including breakfast was extremely good value for money. This hotel is situated next to the Armouries and a pleasant 10 minute walk into Leeds centre.
reviews.title: Good, basic accomodation

reviews.text: The hotel Reception and seating area is contemporary in design with a bar area combined. The double room was simply furnished even a little spartan but offered a desk, tv, hanging/shelving unit, hairdryer and the complimentary tea/coffee was very welcome. The bathroom has a power shower and seperate toilet. Toiletries are minimal comprising of wall hung shower cream and handwash, so you might wish to bring your own.
reviews.title: Always good

reviews.text: Breakfast comprised of toast, pastries, cereals, juice, tea, coffee and a selection of hot items - sausage, scrambled egg and beans which was absolutely adequate.
reviews.title: Great location, just too many empty outlets. Awful beds and pillows

reviews.text: The common areas were very clean and the room was also spotless.
reviews.title: Good value on a weekend

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Receptionist was extremely helpful, providing a map of the area and suggestions for eateries. We asked for extra cups and pillows and these were in the room when we returned from our evening meal. Parking was in the multi-story next door and a voucher was given upon check-out which we presented to the parking office, which they validated for reduced parking, £8.00 overnight.
reviews.title: Canalside Comfort

aka: Holiday Inn Express Leeds City Centre-Armouries Hotel
description: Offering modern accommodation the new Express by Holiday Inn Leeds Armouries has been created for value and comfort. The hotel has air conditioned rooms and public areas and every room is equipped with all the facilities guests need for a relaxing and comfortable stay, an invigorating power shower, satellite TV, in-room movies and broadband access and tea and coffee making facilities. Located in the heart of Leeds, next to Royal Armouries Museum, this Leeds hotel is the perfect choice for leisure and business, offering 130 rooms and 3 meeting rooms. Guests can enjoy our delicious complimentary continental buffet breakfast in our great room. If you want impressive architecture, exciting nightlife, great shopping and world-renowned sports venues then our hotel in Leeds is ideally located. The hotel is only a 15 minutes walk from the vibrant city of Leeds and Leeds city train station. With most of Leeds City Centre pedestrianised it is perfect for family outings and compliments visitor s needs. With the stunning Yorkshire Dales within close distance, is it any wonder that Leeds attracts over 11 million visitors each year. Our first-rate meeting room facilities can offer your business an excellent venue for all your corporate needs. Express by Holiday Inn Leeds Armouries is able to meet the demands of this fast moving environment by offering first class meeting room facilities and first class service.
